title: Remove Gmail/Google login feature

requirements.text: Remove any Gmail/Google login button, option, or reference from the login page (frontend/src/components/LoginPage.tsx). The only authentication method available must be Internet Identity. Delete any Google-related imports, state variables, handlers, and UI elements. The Internet Identity login button and all existing page content must remain untouched.

quotes: remove the feature of login by gmail

acceptanceCriteria: The login page renders with no Gmail or Google login button.
No Google OAuth imports, SDK scripts, or handler functions remain in LoginPage.tsx or any other frontend file.
Internet Identity login continues to work correctly.
No console errors related to missing Google libraries or configurations.

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts.
Do not alter backend authentication logic.
nonGoals: Changing the Internet Identity login flow.
Modifying any screen other than the login page.
